=UML2 Class Diagram Generator for Eclipse 3.5=
Developed for Eclipse 3.5.1 and latest UML2 plugin from Galileo release

Here's an example, run this JUnit test class: [http://code.google.com/p/moten-util/source/browse/moten-util/trunk/src/test/java/moten/david/util/uml/eclipse/UmlProducerTest.java UmlProducerTest.java]

This produces the xmi file _target/result.uml_.

If you have UML2 installed then right mouse on _target/result.uml_ gives you:

http://moten-util.googlecode.com/svn/moten-util/trunk/docs/initialize-class-diagram.png

and you then end up with a file _result.umlclass_ which is opened by the UML2 editor and looks like:

http://moten-util.googlecode.com/svn/moten-util/trunk/docs/demo.png
